boat.full_description: Rebuilt by testers in. 2003 nrw engine vetus new decks cabin insides mast spars and sails, maintained ever since being repainted now August 2023, 44 berth sea toilet deprh sounder compass fishermans anchor 10 mm chain 22t mts, see it on MJ lewis boat sails sailing, has won its class, £15000 or part exchange on a 16 ' oysterman if you have one,
boat.name: Megan
